name: Brown & Brown, Inc.
description: Brown & Brown, Inc. is a leading independent insurance intermediary headquartered in Daytona Beach, Florida. Founded in 1939 by J. Stephen Brown and his brother, the company has grown to become one of the largest insurance brokerage firms in the United States. Brown & Brown provides a broad range of insurance solutions and services, including property and casualty insurance, employee benefits, and risk management services. The firm operates through a network of subsidiary offices across the country, offering tailored solutions to meet the unique needs of its diverse client base, which includes individuals, businesses, and organizations. The company is recognized for its commitment to customer service and its ability to leverage technology to deliver innovative insurance products and services. With a focus on organic growth and strategic acquisitions, Brown & Brown continues to expand its market presence while maintaining a strong reputation for integrity and reliability. The company also emphasizes community involvement and corporate responsibility as part of its corporate culture. As it looks to the future, Brown & Brown is positioned to capitalize on industry trends and continue its legacy of excellence in the insurance sector.
